content: generate an ui to display this list of restaurant, the user must be able to search and filter by location, price etc. restaurants: [{"name":"La Bella Italia","address":"123 Main Street, Downtown","location":{"city":"New York","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Italian","Mediterranean"],"pricy_score":7},{"name":"Sushi Paradise","address":"456 Ocean Avenue, Waterfront","location":{"city":"San Francisco","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Japanese","Sushi","Asian"],"pricy_score":8},{"name":"Burger Junction","address":"789 Park Lane, Midtown","location":{"city":"Chicago","country":"USA"},"food_types":["American","Burgers","Fast Food"],"pricy_score":4},{"name":"Le Jardin","address":"321 Rose Boulevard, Uptown","location":{"city":"Paris","country":"France"},"food_types":["French","Fine Dining"],"pricy_score":9},{"name":"Spice Garden","address":"654 Market Street, Downtown","location":{"city":"London","country":"UK"},"food_types":["Indian","Vegetarian","Asian"],"pricy_score":5},{"name":"Taco Fiesta","address":"987 Beach Road, Beachside","location":{"city":"Los Angeles","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Mexican","Latin American"],"pricy_score":3},{"name":"The Golden Dragon","address":"147 Temple Street, Chinatown","location":{"city":"San Francisco","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Chinese","Asian","Dim Sum"],"pricy_score":6},{"name":"Mediterranean Breeze","address":"258 Harbor Drive, Waterfront","location":{"city":"Barcelona","country":"Spain"},"food_types":["Mediterranean","Greek","Seafood"],"pricy_score":7},{"name":"The Steakhouse","address":"369 Executive Plaza, Business District","location":{"city":"New York","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Steakhouse","American","Fine Dining"],"pricy_score":9},{"name":"Café Delights","address":"741 College Avenue, University District","location":{"city":"Boston","country":"USA"},"food_types":["Café","Breakfast","Bakery"],"pricy_score":3}]
I'll create a comprehensive restaurant discovery UI with search and filter capabilities.

function.name: A2ui_payload
function.arguments: {"title": "Restaurant Discovery App", "description": "A2UI Restaurant Listing with Search and Filters", "type": "object", "additionalProperties": false, "properties":
